materials.raw_text:
Barium (Ba): 24 g 
 Ruthenium (Ru): 1 g 
 Terbium (Tb): 7 g 
 Technetium (Tc): 3 g 
 Yttrium (Y): 1 g

2. In a clean, dry glass or ceramic container, add 24 g of Barium.

4. Add 7 g of Terbium slowly while continuously stirring.

preparation.raw_text:
